pages.title: Ritual Introduction
pages.text: $(l:e_item_magic_sigil)Magic Sigils/el have the ability to store complicated instructions that are often used in $(l:e_ritual_overview)Rituals/el. These Rituals can be used for various things. The easiest Ritual you can perform is summoning a $(l:e_entity_demon)Demon/el.

Since the only useful thing you can get from a $(l:e_entity_demon)Demon/el is the loot when killing him, you might want to perform other $(l:e_ritual_overview)Rituals/el that can make your life easier. Unfortunately these Rituals require some rare resources you can only get in the Depth dimension, so you might want to travel there first.TODO
